scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy public
scripts.db:migrate: wrangler d1 execute prompt-gallery-db --remote --file=./migrations/001_initial_schema.sql && wrangler d1 execute prompt-gallery-db --remote --file=./migrations/002_seed_data.sql
scripts.db:migrate:local: wrangler d1 execute prompt-gallery-db --local --file=./migrations/001_initial_schema.sql && wrangler d1 execute prompt-gallery-db --local --file=./migrations/002_seed_data.sql
